title: He Talks All The Time And At The Wrong Time
itunes:title: He Talks All The Time And At The Wrong Time
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in a relationship with a man that is a contributor on our local news. He’s also an auctioneer at an auto auction. He makes all of his money by talking. Whenever we go to dinner or anywhere out in public, he holds a conversation with others and I’m standing there nudging him to leave folks alone. All during my reality shows, he asks me who is who and why the people act like that...........................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
